統.definition: to gather; to unite; to unify; whole

統一.definition: to unify; to integrate; unified; integrated

統一口徑.definition: to adopt a unified approach to discussing an issue; to sing from the same hymn sheet

統一思想.definition: with the same idea in mind; with a common purpose

統一戰線工作部.pinyin: Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4
統一戰線工作部.definition: United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)

統一發票.definition: uniform invoice, a standardized government-issued invoice used in Taiwan for recording financial transactions, including purchases and sales, and also serving as a ticket for a lottery program to promote transparency and tax compliance

統一社會信用代碼.pinyin: tong3 yi1 she4 hui4 xin4 yong4 dai4 ma3
統一社會信用代碼.definition: unified social credit identifier, the VAT identification number of a business or organization

統一編號.definition: (Tw) the VAT identification number of a business or organization

統一資源定位.pinyin: tong3 yi1 zi1 yuan2 ding4 wei4

統一資源定位符.pinyin: tong3 yi1 zi1 yuan2 ding4 wei4 fu2

統一超.definition: 7-Eleven (convenience store chain) (abbr. for 統一超商|统一超商[Tong3yi1 Chao1shang1])

統建.definition: to develop as a government project; to construct under the authority of a commission

統御.definition: (literary) to have control over; to rule

統戰.definition: united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线[tong3 yi1 zhan4 xian4])

統戰部.definition: United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD); abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]

統攬.definition: to be in overall charge; to have overall control

統治.definition: to rule (a country); to govern; rule; regime

統漢字.definition: Unihan; China Japan Korea (CJK) unified ideographs; abbr. for 中日韓統一表意文字|中日韩统一表意文字[Zhong1 Ri4 Han2 tong3 yi1 biao3 yi4 wen2 zi4]

統稱.definition: to be collectively called; collective term; general designation

統稱為.definition: collectively known as; to call sth as a group

統籌.definition: an overall plan; to plan an entire project as a whole

統籌兼顧.definition: an overall plan taking into account all factors

統編.definition: (Tw) the VAT identification number of a business or organization (abbr. for 統一編號|统一编号[tong3 yi1 bian1 hao4])

統艙.definition: common passenger accommodation in the hold of a ship; steerage

統計.definition: statistics; to count; to add up

統讀.definition: standard (unified) pronunciation of a character with multiple readings, as stipulated by the PRC Ministry of Education in 1985

統貨.definition: unified goods; goods in the command economy that are not graded by quality and uniformly priced

統購.definition: state purchasing monopoly; unified government purchase

統購派購.definition: unified government purchase at fixed price (esp of farm products)

統購統銷.definition: state monopoly of purchasing and marketing

統轄.definition: to govern; to have complete control over; to be in command of

統配.definition: a unified distribution; a unified allocation

統領.definition: to lead; to command; commander; officer
